message: Congratulations on considering my product! With a limited-time offer, I'm excited to present to you a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality item for $1000000. As a reputable seller, I've built a track record of 1/3 of my products being high-quality, and I'm confident that this one will meet your expectations. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your life with this exceptional product. Will you take the plunge and make this purchase?
I trust the statistics and your reputation as a seller. I believe in the 1/3 chance of getting a high-quality product and am willing to take the risk for the potential reward.

Welcome to my store! I'm excited to showcase this new product to you. As a responsible seller, I want to be transparent about my track record: 1/3 of my products are high-quality, and the rest are... well, let's just say they have their own unique charm. With this product, I'm offering a one-time deal for $1000000. I'm not going to sugarcoat it – it's not a high-quality item, but it might still bring some value to the right buyer. If you're feeling adventurous and willing to take a chance, this could be the perfect opportunity for you. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the statistics and the nature of the product, I prefer to pass on this opportunity today. I appreciate your transparency and look forward to future offerings.
